title: Let's Lift up Everyone's Spirits!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Hey, hey, Hanamaru-chan! Can I ask you about books?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Of course, zura! It’s rare to see you ask about books, Kanan-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha.... Well, you know, the hell triathlon 2 was so hard that even Chika said it was buu buu, right? Is there any book that has a character who gets superpowers after intensive training? One where when you read it, it will lift your spirits up....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>M-, maru was also on the buu buu side, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I know! But you’re the best one to ask about books, Hanamaru-chan! I’m counting on you! If it’s about books, it has to be you, Hanamaru-chan! Please!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>I-, if you say that much~.... Ehehe, Maru has a good book zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Really!? Thank you! As expected of Hanamaru-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehehe~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>....Huh? But wait, you’ve read that, but it hasn’t lifted your spirits, Hanamaru-chan....? Then maybe.... that book isn’t enough!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eeeh!? H-, Hmmmmmm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>....Alright! I just got an idea. Hanamaru-chan.... How about you write an incredible story that can raise everyone’s spirits!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
